channel.title: Four 4's
channel.description:
:O I'm having trouble finding some of these
Brain Teasers in Math since we just finished our finals.. (I got a 83 B on it :D)
I need to find numbers 0-52 using a equation with 4 fours
EX: 4+4 = 8 44/2 = 22
Nevermind.. Google ..
http://mathforum.org/ruth/four4s.puzzle.html

item.title: Four 4's
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“fezz, post:10, topic:98777”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=141950.msg1366833#msg1366833 date=1179988663]
Mine is’nt that bad. Full of druggys(cocaine). there not upp-tight like most are. No uniforms =)
[/quote]

oh, we got uniforms… our gym teacher is so GAY

WE PLAY SAFETY-BALL, NOT DODGE-BALL… dodge-ball is too dangerous :o you could get hit with the dodgeball… omg…[/quote]

I lol’d.

Read full topic

item.title: Four 4's
item.dc:creator: @redragonje65 redragonje65
item.description:
@redragonje65 wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:2, topic:98777”]100-93 = a
93-85 = b
85-79 = c
and idk rest. but i think 73 is an f? it may be different at your school but thats what it is here[/quote]

my parents would kick me out of the house when i was in elementary school with those standards

Read full topic

item.title: Four 4's
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:3, topic:98777”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=141950.msg1361838#msg1361838 date=1179900558]
100-93 = a
93-85 = b
85-79 = c
and idk rest. but i think 73 is an f? it may be different at your school but thats what it is here
[/quote]

Umm…

100-90 = A
89-80 = B
79-70 = C
69-60 = D
50-0 = F…[/quote]

its different, i think public schools have 100-90=A and etc. and private have 100-93=A etc

Read full topic
